rus

SURVIVE AT ALL COSTS

Experience new social battle royale game

The story

What is SOS?

social battle
royale game

Each round, you and 15 other contestants compete to escape a deadly island filled with monsters. The trick is: three people an survive. Will you run solo or form friendships with others to escape?

Making the right decisions could be the difference between life and death.

What’s so special?

features

  • SURVIVE AT ALL COSTS

    You have 30 minutes to find a relic, signal for extraction, and grab one of three spots on the rescue chopper.

  • CREATE ALLIES AND ENEMIES

  • IMPRESS THE AUDIENCE

Can My Computer Run this game?

system requirements

OS: PROCESSOR:
Windows 7 64-bit only (No OSX support at this time) Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4 GHZ or AMD Athlon X2 @ 2.8 GHZ
mEMORY: storage:
8 GB RAM 8 GB available space
GRAPHICS:
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX11 (Shader Model 5)
